LanguageData.WearingPipBoy.label: Pip-Boy
LanguageData.WearingPipBoy.description: VATS, or Vault-Tec Assisted Targeting System, is an advanced combat technology whose origins are lost in time…
LanguageData.WearingPipBoy.stages.0.label: V.A.T.S.
LanguageData.LastGiftofWatcher.label: Mechanites Overflowing with Energy
LanguageData.BombJ.label: Booby-Trapped
LanguageData.VaultBoyMedicine.label: Medicine Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyMedicine.description: A smart person knows that bandages only hide a wound.
LanguageData.VaultBoyEloquence.label: Eloquence Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyIntelligence.label: Intelligence Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyIntelligence.description: The smartest one is the one who never stops learning new things.
LanguageData.VaultBoyRepair.label: Repair Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyRepair.description: Why go down with the ship when you can try to patch the hole?
LanguageData.VaultBoyBarter.label: Barter Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyBarter.description: Nothing says "good" like a charming smile.
